Module contents

DAQ Plotting Library

Sub-package of muTel used for plotting with a standard style derived from the CMS style guidlines for python available in this tutorial https://indico.cern.ch/event/1398843/#1-plotting-tools-and-recommend.

It also enables defining a .yaml file with the default parameters (or custom) for the plot style (bins, range, name of the field, label, …).

Structure

The package is divided in two modules: plots for plotting and config to handle the plot styling configuration.

Module

plots

This module contains all the default plot types used and more classes may be added using the CMSPlot object as a template.

config

This module handles the styling of the plots and reading the config .yaml files.
